episodeTitle: Food, Nami and Shadows!! Luffy's Angry Counterattack
episodeTitleJapanese: メシとナミと影！！ルフィ怒りの大反撃
episodeTitleRomanized: Meshi to Nami to Kage!! Rufi Ikari no Daihangeki
description: The Straw Hat Pirates split up across Thriller Bark to accomplish multiple objectives: helping Brook recover his shadow, rescuing Nami from Absalom's forced wedding, and confronting Gecko Moria. An enraged Luffy and Sanji decimate zombie forces, but are stopped by Perona's Negative Hollows. Meanwhile, Oars awakens and begins exploring the massive ship, creating chaos.

events.title: Straw Hats Divide to Rescue Nami and Retrieve Shadows
events.description: After deciding to help Brook and recruit him, the Straw Hat Pirates split into groups with multiple objectives: retrieving their stolen shadows from Gecko Moria, rescuing Nami from Absalom's forced wedding, and recovering their stolen food and treasure before dawn.
events.significance: This strategic division marks the beginning of the climactic confrontation in Thriller Bark, with the crew coordinating multiple simultaneous operations against Moria's forces.

quotes.text: We need to get our shadows back before dawn!
quotes.speaker: Usopp
quotes.context: Explaining the urgency of their mission

events.title: Usopp Distributes Salt to Purify Zombies
events.description: Usopp provides bags of salt to each crew member, explaining that salt can purify zombies by extracting the shadows implanted in them. The salt contains trace amounts of sea water, which neutralizes the Devil Fruit powers keeping the zombies animated.
events.significance: Reveals the crucial weakness of Gecko Moria's zombie army and provides the Straw Hats with a tactical advantage in the coming battles.

quotes.text: This salt will purify the zombies and free their shadows!
quotes.speaker: Usopp
quotes.context: Explaining the salt purification method to the crew

events.title: Hogback Frustrated with Absalom's Wedding Plans
events.description: Dr. Hogback becomes frustrated and angry that Absalom is holding a wedding ceremony with Nami using the General Zombies as guests, disrupting their operations. Hogback assumes command as the second-in-charge of zombie forces.
events.significance: Shows tension within the Thriller Bark leadership and establishes Hogback's increased role in coordinating the zombie army.

events.title: Sanji's Rage Over Nami's Forced Wedding
events.description: Upon learning about Absalom's forced wedding to Nami and his previous spying on her, Sanji erupts in an intense, fiery rage that causes him to literally burst into flames. His fury is so intense that it overwhelms his body with heat and anger.
events.significance: This iconic moment of Sanji's protective rage became known among fans as 'Sanji's Super Saiyan mode' and later inspired his post-timeskip Hell Memories technique.

quotes.text: That bastard... I'll never forgive him for what he did to Nami-san!
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Sanji's furious response to learning about Absalom's actions

events.title: Luffy and Sanji Decimate Zombie Forces
events.description: An enraged Luffy and Sanji charge through Thriller Bark, decimating most of the zombie forces they encounter with overwhelming force. They cut through dozens of zombies rapidly as they race toward their objectives.
events.significance: Demonstrates the combat prowess of the Straw Hats against Moria's zombie army and showcases their determination to rescue Nami and retrieve their shadows.

events.title: Perona's Negative Hollow Stops Luffy and Sanji
events.description: Perona deploys her Negative Hollow ghosts against the charging Luffy and Sanji. The ghosts pass through both fighters, draining their will and causing them to collapse in extreme negativity. Luffy wishes he could be reborn as a mosquito, while Sanji laments having a soul as bad as his curly eyebrows.
events.significance: Reveals the devastating psychological power of Perona's Horo Horo no Mi ability and demonstrates that even powerful fighters can be completely neutralized by her Negative Hollows.

quotes.text: I want to be reborn... as a mosquito...
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Under the effect of Perona's Negative Hollow

quotes.text: My soul is as bad as my curly eyebrows...
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Under the effect of Perona's Negative Hollow

events.title: Oars Awakens and Begins Exploring Thriller Bark
events.description: The massive Special Zombie Oars, animated with Luffy's stolen shadow, awakens and begins exploring the enormous Thriller Bark ship. He yells for food (particularly for Sanji to cook for him) and marvels at the size of Thriller Bark, nearly falling off at one point.
events.significance: Introduces Oars as the most powerful zombie in Moria's army and the primary threat the Straw Hats will need to overcome. His possession of Luffy's shadow gives him Luffy's personality and memories.

quotes.speaker: Oars
quotes.context: Oars yelling for food upon awakening, reflecting Luffy's personality

events.title: Oars Jumps From the Mast, Separating the Crew
events.description: When Oars leaps from the main mast onto the stairs, the impact causes Luffy, Chopper, and Robin to be separated from Usopp and Sanji, falling down to where Zoro and Franky are located. This unintentionally divides the Straw Hat forces.
events.significance: Creates new dynamics in the crew's assault on Thriller Bark and sets up different confrontations with Moria's forces.

events.title: Oars' Body Doesn't Stretch Like Luffy's
events.description: Despite having Luffy's shadow, Oars attempts to use stretching abilities but his giant corpse body doesn't respond the same way. His arms and legs fail to stretch, showing that the shadow only transfers personality and memories, not Devil Fruit abilities.
events.significance: Clarifies the limitations of Gecko Moria's shadow-stealing ability and establishes that Devil Fruit powers are tied to the body, not the shadow.

events.title: Perona Learns Oars is Uncontrollable
events.description: Perona discovers that Oars is not under Moria's control and is acting independently due to the strong personality of Luffy's shadow. Moria explains he needs to 'break' the giant zombie first before he can be properly controlled.
events.significance: Reveals the challenge of controlling powerful zombies with strong-willed shadows and foreshadows the difficulty Moria will have in managing Oars.

events.title: Zoro Explains Shadow Retrieval Plan
events.description: Zoro explains to the separated group that their plan is to defeat Gecko Moria to retrieve all their stolen shadows. Meanwhile, Luffy expresses excitement about seeing how 'cool' Oars is with his shadow, showing his characteristic enthusiasm even in dire circumstances.
events.significance: Establishes the crew's understanding of their objective and showcases Luffy's unique perspective on the situation.

quotes.text: We need to defeat Moria to get our shadows back!
quotes.speaker: Zoro
quotes.context: Explaining the plan to retrieve their shadows

quotes.text: I want to see how cool Oars is with my shadow!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's excited reaction to seeing Oars

events.title: Hogback and Moria Admire Oars' Strength
events.description: Dr. Hogback admires Oars' incredible physical strength while Gecko Moria laughs with sadistic pleasure at the destruction his special zombie is capable of causing. Both villains show confidence in their ultimate victory.
events.significance: Establishes the villains' overconfidence and their belief that Oars is an unstoppable weapon.

themes.description: The Straw Hats demonstrate strategic thinking by dividing into teams with specific objectives, showing their growth as a coordinated crew.
themes.symbolism: The crew's division represents their trust in each other and their ability to work independently toward a common goal.

themes.description: Sanji's explosive rage over Nami's mistreatment showcases the crew's protective bonds and their willingness to fight fiercely for their nakama.
themes.symbolism: Sanji's literal flames of anger represent the burning intensity of his devotion to protecting his crewmates.
culturalReferences: Fan comparison to Dragon Ball's Super Saiyan transformation

themes.description: Perona's Negative Hollow ability demonstrates that physical strength isn't everything, and psychological attacks can be equally devastating.
themes.symbolism: The ghosts passing through bodies represent how mental attacks bypass physical defenses.

characterSpotlights.development: Sanji's protective rage reaches new heights, previewing his future Hell Memories technique and demonstrating the depth of his devotion to protecting Nami.

characterSpotlights.development: Oars awakens as the most powerful zombie, showcasing Luffy's personality traits while lacking his Devil Fruit abilities, creating a unique threat.

Attempts but fails to use stretching abilities

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime added extended close-up scenes of Sanji's rage, emphasizing the 'Super Saiyan' visual effect that fans later referenced.
The anime extended the zombie-fighting sequences with Luffy and Sanji for dramatic effect.

trivia.fact: Sanji's rage in this episode became so iconic among fans that they dubbed it 'Sanji's Super Saiyan mode,' despite no actual Dragon Ball reference in the anime.
This intense rage moment later became the basis for Sanji's post-timeskip technique 'Hell Memories' (Episode 566) and the anime-only 'Sexy Fire' technique in Film Z.
Oars is voiced by the same actor as Luffy (Mayumi Tanaka in Japanese, Colleen Clinkenbeard in English) but with a distorted effect to reflect that it's Luffy's shadow in Oars' body.
The episode adapts pages 2-19 of Chapter 460 titled 'Get Back Before Dawn!!'
One Piece stopped having ending themes before the Thriller Bark arc, so episodes 326-372 only featured the 'Jungle P' opening.
